name: Sweet Dip Cream Cheese Spread
preparation: In bowl, using an electric mixer or wooden spoon, beat cream cheese with 1 tbsp sweet dip mix until smooth. Taste and blend in remaining dip, if desired.
Gradually beat in milk, 1 tbsp at a time, until soft and spreadable.
If making ahead, cover and refrigerate up to 5 days.
tips: Spread over bagels, toast, or add spoonfuls to muffin and brownie batters.
